MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart, affecting properties in Whithorn and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.35pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because additional fault finding investigations are now required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:05pm on Tuesday, 24 November 2020
